name: Crashing Commute
description:
Every meter could be your last!
While leisurely taking your daily route to work, the unthinkable happens... All four of your tires instantly go up in smoke! Without any control over your vehicle, try to survive the incoming onslaught of blue-collar transportation.  Make your way through the perils of the commute and collect all the sandwiches you can, good luck!

Controls:
A - LEFT
D - RIGHT

WheelyBigTrouble by Erasmus Magnus
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

8bit Bossa by Joth_Music

Car Tire Squeal Skid Loop by qubodup
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
